text:
Hi Matt, no problem at all! hope you're feeling better
I actually applied for the visual development internship, my showreel for that is here: <https://vimeo.com/331935002>
I really enjoy character design and vis dev and I initially was working towards this goal, however I recently did some storyboarding for a small freelance commission and I absolutely loved it. I love being able to breathe life into a script and the marriage of animation and cinematography is just perfect for me, so I've been working on building a board portfolio.
All of my boards are on my website <http://www.bengardener.com|www.bengardener.com> and the animatics are also on my vimeo page <https://vimeo.com/bengardenerart>
I really want to work in TV animation and get a feel for series development, as I love cartoons and my style lends itself well to this. However, at this stage I think the most beneficial thing I can do is to get any client work I can just to be able to demonstrate the completion of briefs etc.
Do you have any tips on that front? I hear that trawling hashtags on FB and twitter is effective, have you found that to be so?

attachments.text: A selection of my best character, environment and prop designs for the year of our lord 2019
